snippet.title: Opening movie of the smartphone game "MARS RED: Edge of The Nightmare"
snippet.description:
This is the opening movie for "MARS RED: Edge of The Nightmare", the new smartphone game app from the TV anime "MARS RED" scheduled to air in April 2021.

For more information, click here
Official game website: https://marsred-game.net/en/
Official game Twitter: https://twitter.com/marsredgame


ⓒBun-o Fujisawa/SIGNAL.MD/ MARS RED Production Committee
ⓒD-techno
